thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 2 of 142
thread.title: Caroline H.

author: Caroline H.
title: Caroline H.
text:
I was unsatisfied with my first batch of business cards from MOO because the color wasn't the one expected. I received a voucher that I used 1 month after because I didn't have time to deal with it before. I changed paper color and font for the second cards without any extra cost or even a question from them.
Unfortunately the second batch came in off center (printer error), they reprinted them within 48 hours of my request. And they now look exactly like what I want. Amazing job!
